author: vgritsenko
msg: Use junit task batch test. Increase test log level from none to warn.

author: vgritsenko
msg: * (Almost) remove programmatic test suite composition. Let Ant do it. Result is
that it is easier to add new tests, and report looks more readable.
* Add more tests to the XPathQuery test.

author: vgritsenko
msg: Check that passed name matches with the name provided in the configuration

author: vgritsenko
msg: Reduce synchronization scope when adding record - synchronize only while searching free page.
Add attempt to release free page if write fails.
Add check on large keys (over one page size) - HashFiler does not support them.
